text:
I am grateful Adrian got an opportunity to remember what we truly were for a bit. Even if Christine and I disagree on adult issues, he sees nothing
but love and support for what we were as a family. The visits gives him time, space, and permission to honor the part of himself that he has lost
touch with. Lots of laughs, wrestling, and healthy teasing made us feel normal for a few hours.
Message 3074 of 4024
Yes I read Alan’s reports.

grab it
